//\\__ hr1212 __//\\

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef map<int,int> mi;

#define si(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define sii(a,b) scanf("%lld %lld",&a,&b)
#define nl printf("\n");
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define all(c) (c).begin(),(c).end()
#define f(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rf(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define clr(x,a) memset(x,a,sizeof(x))
#define MAX 1000100
#define MOD 1000000007

ll n,m,a[800],hr[800];
ll b[800],c[800],ans[800];

void mul(ll z[800],ll y[800]){
    ll i,j,k;
    clr(c,0);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
            c[i]^=(z[j]&y[(j-i+n)%n]);
    }
}

void cal(ll k){
    ll i,j;
    clr(ans,0);
    ans[0]=1;
    while(k){
        if(k&1){
            mul(ans,b);
            f(i,0,n)
                ans[i]=c[i];
            k--;
        }
        else{
            mul(b,b);
            f(i,0,n)
                b[i]=c[i];
            k>>=1;
        }
    }
}

int main(){
    ll r,k,i,x=0,y=0,j,t,l,z,x1=0,y1=0;

    si(t);
    while(t--){
        sii(n,k);
        f(i,0,n)
            si(a[i]);
        clr(b,0);
        b[0]=1;b[1]=1;b[n-1]=1;
        cal(k);
        clr(hr,0);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            for(j=0;j<n;j++)
                hr[i]^=(a[j]*ans[(j-i+n)%n]);
        }
        f(i,0,n)
            printf("%lld ",hr[i]);
        nl;
    }

    return 0;
}
